text: Sano ajula (Potifala) jwa ku Misra jwaŵansumile (Yusufu) ŵasalile ŵankwakwe kuti: “Munkolochesyani ndamo jakwe, mwine chachitukamuchisya, kapena tugambe kuntenda kuŵa mwanache (jwetu).” Soni iyyoyopeyo niyatwatite pakuntamilichikasya Yusufu m’chilambo (cha Misra), soni kuti tun’jiganye gopolela abali (sya sagamisi). Sano Allah ni Jwakupunda pa itendo Yakwe, nambo ŵandu ŵajinji ngakumanyilila
